import "./Projects.css" export default function Projects() { return (

Projects

For more details, please visit my projects tab on LinkedIn

Avoid the Veggies

HTML - CSS - JS

A simplified twist on the classic minesweeper game! This project focuses primarily on front-end web development. All of the functionality was coded using JavaScript. The app manipulates the DOM and stores information in the classes of the objects.

I chose this approach because it made the most sense to me, however anyone with a little bit of curiosity and a working knowledge of dev tools would be able to cheat. This was a fun little challenge that took me 4 days to complete.

Check it out!

LASO App

MEN Stack

A quick on the go study tool inspired by my own pursuit of studying the japanese language. My initial idea was to find and utilize a language API focused on Japanese. With no luck I created my own little thing. This led me to think, what if I created my own Japanese Language API? Lastly, working on this app acted as a catalyst for my interest in mobile app development.

Check it out!

Error Diary

Django - Py - PostgreSQL

Multi-user app for keeping track of ones errors as they code. Early on into our bootcamp, out TA's said that it would be helpful for us to keep track of our errors and solutions to those errors. It would help us in the future because it gives us a point of reference as to how we solved a similar error in the past.

This was my first collaboration project. I was blessed with a great team. We used Django and Python in the backend and coded in express templates for the front-end. We integrated PostgreSQL, Webscraping, and Bootstrap for styling.

Check it out!
) }
